alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 06 at 2:55AM MST until January 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Fort Morgan, and Akron. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Weather Advisory will expire due to decreasing snow bands and snowfall rates. Light snow will continue through early morning Thursday.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
